lessons.title: How to Build a Startup
lessons.author: Y Combinator
lessons.description: Sam Altman and the partners of YC teach you how to start a startup. This lecture covers the basics of starting a company, including the idea, team, product, and execution.

lessons.title: How to Pitch Your Startup in 3 Minutes
lessons.author: Michael Seibel
lessons.description: A great pitch is crucial for fundraising, recruiting, and more. Michael Seibel, CEO of Y Combinator, breaks down how to craft a compelling 3-minute pitch.

lessons.title: How to Get Your First 1,000 Users
lessons.author: Gustaf Alströmer
lessons.description: Getting your first users is one of the hardest parts of building a startup. Gustaf Alströmer, partner at YC, shares actionable strategies to acquire your initial user base.

lessons.title: How to Build a Great Product
lessons.author: Y Combinator
lessons.description: Learn the principles of building products that users love. This lecture covers the importance of talking to users, iterating quickly, and focusing on a core problem.

lessons.title: A Guide to Pre-seed Fundraising
lessons.author: Y Combinator
lessons.description: This lecture provides a comprehensive guide to raising a pre-seed round, including how to find investors, what to put in your deck, and how to close the deal.
